game.name: Thaw
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mine for ore, retrace memories, mine again. The long winter will come to an end when you reach the Snow Crystal in the depths of the mine. A peaceful and cozy mining novel for a sense of fulfilment on sleepless nights.
